name: PortableApps.com - Clean
description: by grom. Clean, modern, minimal style. Removes clutter on Portable Apps, keeping the website minimal and to the point. This is a layout style, it doesn't change colors.
additional_info: Update (2015-03-13): - initial fixes for the website upgrade to Drupal 7. Update (2014-09-27): - removed @font-face due to updating problems it was causing. - fixed translation box position (margin-top). - changed license to CC0 Public Domain, since the CC-BY-3 licensed font is no longer embedded. Update (2014-01-12): - site-wide news banner expands on mouse hover in browsers which support transitions. - compatibility with Stylish 1.4.1 Update (2014-01-06): - removed new social sharing at the bottom of recent posts.
